attributes.action: How ashamed are you that our politicians' corruptedness prevents us having a national DNA databases?
attributes.additional_details: And we will not be able to identify ISIS terrorists who embark upon a killing spree in this country, as they surely will soon, in the same way the French were able to identify Couliaby within 24 hours of him killing a policewoman in Paris?  A national DNA database is absolutely vital to the future security of this country.  It is the gross dishonesty of you and your fellow party political activists which make it an enduring impossibility for it to happen if innocent people are to be protected from corrupt misuse of the data by you and others like you.
